channel.title: Quick Banner + Old st00f. + NEW SEXY YOSHI!
channel.description:
SEXY YOSHI!, took about 8 minutes!!!
V1- [IMG]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/6749/yoshibitch.png[/img] V2-[IMG]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/5642/yoshibitch2.png[/img] V2= fixed text, made yoshi a tad more transparent.
Gimp, made for wut i release on mopar.
[IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/4357/mscp.png[/img]
Ik it's bright and i had to work around crash my v2.6.6 or w.e crashes about 9/10 after one operation like e.g selecting a brush, next thing such as crop tool, crash. Nothing fancy ofc. anyway heres the old shiz: oh mai hax bandwidth exceeded, time to do some photobucket owning.(brb with fixed pics) Rate outa 10 plawkz :D, Note, most of the below are requests, cept the music one.
ere we go
[IMG]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/585/assassinrw5.png[/img] [IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/7061/holyfurypp5.png[/img] [IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/2953/narutosiggoodcopy1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/9954/ronded.png[/img] [IMG]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/4396/siggywoot.png[/img] [IMG]http://img130.imageshack.us/img130/3193/sparten2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Quick Banner + Old st00f. + NEW SEXY YOSHI!
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

Not really, the music (Black+White) was my techniqually most recent, the yoshi i made 10 min ago, and i use swiftkit for uploading :

I havn’t used gimp for a long time since then for actual work other than possible client backrounds or requests from ppl via supercheats.com, most of the st00f on pg 5-7 last pages are the stuff i made when i first learned to use the magic wand tool :D, hense why theres 3 billion junky shit there.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 17, 2009, 11:19:22 pm[/size][hr]Here i even posted it here: http://forums.supercheats.com/topic.php?topic=106745 as well…

item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

Elijah, this is all shit, why would i rip?

xxholyfuryxx = a friend from 3 years ago, made two sigs for him
shadowfire1138 was my supercheats.com acc.
naruto was a random one i made ages ago and the two music ones i made about half a year ago.

these were the sigs i took off photobucket, because reached max bandwidth… but anyway, flame me about shit sigs 2 years old go for it…

item.title: Quick Banner + Old st00f. + NEW SEXY YOSHI!
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

Well, if i had the render that i got about 2 years ago from that i could easily tell you :p.

The basic thing i did was just colourize it yellow, add some brightness and i added some glacy flare brushes along the sides, as well i added a full scale brush that had that random glacy/ice near the middle.

Basic summery, colour the image, make a new layer, transparent, create the brush that would go around it, make it brighter or darker, which ever, and add text.

Although tbh, the only reason that looks good, is because the render, it just stands out so nice :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 17, 2009, 10:38:54 pm[/size][hr]oh yh btw, the render was from a anime show i watched 2 years ago, full metal alchemist i think?.. www.planetrenders.net was where i usually got everything from for renders.

Read full topic
